text: 15.32 Sav 2.24, Ais 22.13, Luk 12.19-20, 2 Ko 1.8, 4.10-11 Yad taun Epesus mɨdɨl, bɨ ogɨnap chen ladek tek yɨp gɨ tɨmel yɨbɨl gɨl, ayɨp penpen gɨnok. Lum awl gos ak nɨŋɨd tap ogɨnap dɨnɨm agɨl anɨgɨnek akaŋ? Mel yɨbɨl. Binɨb tepayaŋ tɨkjakɨnɨgabal agɨl anɨgɨnek. Binɨb pen tepayaŋ tɨkjakɨnɨgel tek ma lenɨgab, takaw olap apal, Tol pɨsnep kumnɨgabun, anɨb ak mɨñɨl mɨdobun ñɨn awl, tap ñɨbɨlɨg ñɨg ñɨbɨlɨg gɨ yonɨgun apal ak, chɨn nɨŋɨd kɨdek gɨnɨgun.
